Steps.Description:
Execute Powershell Script at \\vrsccm01\apps$\Chef\Install-Chef.ps1 with the following parameters
-Hosts:
  -vrwebsoa01
  -vrapssoa01
  -crencwebprd01
  -crenctskprd01
  -crgfswebprd01
  -crdmzwebprd01
  -vrweborig01
  -crnetwebprd01
  -crwebsrv01
  -vrapscont01
  -vrapsedc01
  -vrapslog01

-Environment prod
-Runlist recipe[nsm_tag_app]
Steps.Notes: This Powershell script bootstraps the server with the Chef client and sets the environment and runlist for the node.

Steps.Description:
Validation:
  -Ensure that the Chef client service is installed and running on the server
  -The server shows up in the Chef management console at https://crcheftstlnx01/organizations/nsm/nodes
  -The assigned runlist and environment are set
